Package edu.rit.gec8773.laps

Class CustomScanner

java.lang.Object
edu.rit.gec8773.laps.scanner.CustomScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scanner, AutoCloseable
public class CustomScanner
extends Object
implements Scanner
An implementation of a Scanner using LineNumberReader and Matcher to handle regular expression matching
See Also:
Scanner, LineNumberReader, Matcher

    • findEnd

      private Integer findEnd​(Pattern pattern) throws IOException
      Tries to find the longest match of a Pattern in the buffer. If the end of the buffer is reached, more input will be read.
      Parameters:
      pattern - the Pattern to match
      Returns:
      last index of the matching region or null if there's no match
      Throws:
      IOException

    • hasNext

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the Pattern matches
      Throws:
      IOException
